title: City & Community - Managing Difference: White Parenting Practices in Socioeconomically Diverse Neighborhoods

description: Author Megan Underhill discusses her article, "Managing Difference: White Parenting Practices in Socioeconomically Diverse Neighborhoods," published in the June 2021 issue of City & Community.
